replace.originalText:
Flying
Aesthir Glider cannot block.

First strike
You may play Benalish Knight any time you could play an instant.
{1}{W}: Prevent 1 damage to a creature or player.
{T}: Cuombajj Witches deals 1 damage to target creature or player of your choice and 1 damage to target creature or player of an opponent's choice. (Choose your target first.)
During your upkeep, target non-Wall creature an opponent controls gains forestwalk until your next turn. (If defending player controls a forest, that creature is unblockable.)
Target creature gets +4/+0.

At the time you play Fireball, pay an additional {1} for each target beyond the first.
Fireball deals X damage divided evenly, rounded down, among any number of target creatures and/or players.
Giant Spider can block creatures with flying.
{R}: Goblin Balloon Brigade gains flying until end of turn.

At the time you play Goblin Grenade, sacrifice a Goblin.
Goblin Grenade deals 5 damage to target creature or player.
All goblins get +1/+1 and gain mountainwalk. (If defending player controls a mountain, those creatures are unblockable.)
When Goblin Matron comes into play, you may search your library for a Goblin card. If you do, reveal that card, put it into your hand, and shuffle your library afterward.

Trample
Goblin Mutant cannot attack if defending player controls an untapped creature with power 3 or more.
Goblin Mutant cannot block a creature with power 3 or more.
When Goblin Recruiter comes into play, search your library for any number of Goblin cards and reveal them to all players. Shuffle your library, then put the revealed cards on top of it in any order.

When Goblin Snowman blocks, it does not deal or receive combat damage that turn.
{T}: Goblin Snowman deals 1 damage to target creature it is blocking.
{R}, {T}: Destroy target artifact. That artifact deals damage equal to its total casting cost to Goblin Tinkerer.
{2}{R}, Sacrifice two Goblins: Put three Goblin tokens into play. Treat these tokens as 1/1 red creatures.
Target player discards two cards at random from his or her hand. (If that player has only one card, he or she discards it.)

Flying
Whenever Hypnotic Specter successfully deals damage to an opponent, that player discards a card at random from his or her hand.

When Icatian Javelineers comes into play, put a javelin counter on it.
{T}, Remove a javelin counter from Icatian Javelineers: Icatian Javelineers deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
{2}, {T}: Draw a card, then choose and discard a card.

Protection from white
{B}: Knight of Stromgald gains first strike until end of turn.
{B}{B}: Knight of Stromgald gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
{T}: Add {G} to your mana pool. Play this ability as a mana source.
Mogg Flunkies cannot attack or block unless another creature you control attacks or blocks the same turn.

Protection from black
{W}: Order of the White Shield gains first strike until end of turn.
{W}{W}: Order of the White Shield gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
Enchanted creature cannot attack or block.

You may remove a red card in your hand from the game instead of paying Pyrokinesis's casting cost.
Pyrokinesis deals 4 damage divided any way you choose among any number of target creatures.

replace.flavor:
"Hi! ni! ya! Behold the man of flint, that's me! / Four lightnings zigzag from me, strike and return."
—Navajo war chant

replace.originalText: Raging Goblin is unaffected by summoning sickness.
replace.flavor: Charging alone takes uncommong daring or uncommon stupidity. Or both.

replace.originalText: {T}: Prevent 1 damage to a creature or player.
{G}, {T}, Sacrifice Scavenger Folk: Destroy target artifact.

Serrated Arrows comes into play with three arrowhead counters on it.
When there are no arrowhead counters on Serrated Arrows, destroy it.
{T}, Remove an arrowhead counter from Serrated Arrows: Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.
When Spectral Bears attacks, if defending player controls no black cards, Spectral Bears does not untap during your next untap phase.

{T}: Add one colors mana to your mana pool.
{T}, Sacrifice Strip Mine: Destroy target land.
Remove target creature from the game. That creature's controller gains life equal to its power.
Destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature. That creature cannot be regenerated this turn.
Enchanted creature gets +2/+1.
{R}: Regenerate Uthden Troll.

Flying
Volcanic Dragon is unaffected by summoning sickness.

Wooly Spider can block creatures with flying.
When Woolly Spider blocks a creature with flying, Woolly Spider gets +0/+2 until end of turn.
